overview: Roman Holiday is directing look at Disney Studios cria 2004.  Lights, Camera, Action!  The cameras are rolling as we make our grand entrance into the land of Hollywood at the Disney Studios.  Step into the spotlight as you enter the world of show business that is always in production.  The local residents take you behind the velvet rope into the glitz and glamour of Hollywood, Disney Style.  Experience memorable motion picture moments at every turn, from the legendary Great Movie Ride to the exciting Indiana Jones Epic Stunt Spectacular.  Blast-off to a place far, far away at Star Tours, hold on tight on Rock ‘n’ Roller Coaster, laugh your way through the “Honey I Shrunk the Kids” movie set and take an elevator ride you’ll never forget at the Hollywood Tower Hotel.  And Don’t miss the grand finale Fantastic and increasable nighttime extravaganza of fireworks, lasers, and Disney Characters.
title: A Day at Hollywood Studios
